name: Aurelion Sol
title: The Star Forger
e_dispalyname: Comet of Legend / Comet of Legend 2

i1.blurb: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' is constantly orbited by three ''Stars'', each doing a full circumference in {{fd|5.25}} seconds, and beyond them exists an {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} affecting his damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]]. Ability-inhibiting {{tip|crowd control}} nullifies ''Center of the Universe''.

The ''Stars'' deal {{pp|20;23;26;29;32;35;40;45;50;55;60 to 130|formula=20+3 per level until lvl 6, then+5 per level until lvl 11, then+10 per level|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|type = [[File:Celestial Expansion.png|20px|border|link=]] Celestial Expansion's Rank|5|5 to 25}})|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|18 to 35}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{As|magic damage}}}} and apply [[spell effects]] to enemies that come in contact with them, executing {{tip|minions}} below {{sti|health|{{as|25 health}}}}.
i1.name: Center of the Universe
notes: * '''Aurelion Sol's''' ''Stars'' have independent vision hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a [[brush]], and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden.
** In addition to not being considered to be projectiles for interception purposes, it is possible that his ''Stars'' are considered [[champion summoned units]].
* An individual ''Star'' must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again.
* In the event that an enemy orbits around '''Aurelion Sol''' at the same rate as his ''Stars'' without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.
* {{tip|Stasis}} from friendly sources (allied {{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, etc.) does not disable ''Center of the Universe''.

q1.blurb: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' fires the core of a newborn star in the target direction, which expands as long as it remains within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} and grants him {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

Upon traveling beyond the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, the core {{ai|Starsurge 2|Aurelion Sol|detonates}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught within and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them, increased by {{pp|11|key=%|type=time traveled|0 to 200|0;0.15;0.3;0.45;0.6;0.75 to 5}}. The core can also be manually detonated after {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}{{st|Minimum Stun Duration|{{ap|0.55 to 0.75}}|Maximum Stun Duration|{{ap|1.65 to 2.25}}}}
q1.name: Starsurge
notes: * So long as '''Aurelion Sol''' manages to keep Starsurge within the '''Outer Limit''', it will continue to expand until detonated or out of range, giving this ability the largest range and radius of any ability in the game.
* Both instances count as ability activations for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Starsurge's'' cooldown starts after detonation.

w1.blurb: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} The {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars'}} base [[damage]] is increased.

{{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' [[File:Celestial Expansion 2.png|20px|link=|border]] pushes his {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}} out to the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} and increases their damage by 50%.
leveling: {{st|Total Damage|{{pp|30; 34.5; 39; 43.5; 48; 52.5; 60; 67.5; 75; 82.5; 90 to 195|formula=30+4.5 per level until lvl 6, then+7.5 per level until lvl 11, then+15 per level}} (+ {{ap|5*1.5 to 25*1.5}}) {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|18*1.5 to 35*1.5}} AP)}}}}
w1.name: Celestial Expansion
notes: *''Celestial Expansion'' does not apply Muramana's ''Shock'' passive.
* Due to being an extension of his innate, [[crowd control]] that inhibits the use of abilities will also disable ''Celestial Expansion'' and put it on cooldown.
** Although {{tip|stasis}} from friendly sources ({{ai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, etc.) does not disable ''Celestial Expansion''.
* Toggle-able abilities do not count as an ability activation for the purposes of effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Toggle-able abilities heal for up to 25 health per second when purchasing {{ii|Rod of Ages}}.

e1.blurb: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Moving in the same direction for more than {{fd|1.75}} seconds grants '''Aurelion Sol''' increasing {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the next 5 seconds which decays every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over 1 second when he changes direction or stops.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' pulls in his {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol|Stars}} and takes {{tip|dash|flight}} in the chosen direction, gaining {{tip|sight}} that {{tt|pierces obstructions|does not reveal Brush, but can see beyond it}}, is {{tip|ghosted}} and can ignore terrain collision. '''Aurelion Sol''' can also be seen regardless of obstructions.

Taking damage from {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|turrets}} or applying effects that move or stop '''Aurelion Sol''' will instantly end {{ai|Comet of Legend 2||Comet of Legend}} early. ''Comet of Legend'' can also be canceled by issuing a movement command or reactivating the ability after {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Comet of Legend'' cannot be activated for 4 seconds after '''Aurelion Sol''' has been damaged by a champion or turret.
e1.name: Comet of Legend
notes: * Effects that instantly cancel {{ai|Comet of Legend 2||Comet of Legend}}.
** {{ii|Stopwatch}} and {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}.
** {{ii|Hextech Protobelt-01}}.
** {{si|Flash}}.
* Effects that can be activated during {{ai|Comet of Legend 2||Comet of Legend}} without cancelling it.
** Every other item effect (including {{ii|Hextech GLP-800}}).
** {{ai|Starsurge|Aurelion Sol}}.

r1.blurb: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' exhales a wave of starfire in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} for 2 seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking targets back}} to the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} if they are within.
r1.name: Voice of Light
notes: * No additional details.
